SENT.plain: We studied six patients with clinical and radiographic evidence of rostral brainstem lesion and bilateral blepharospasm
Two patients also had other facial dystonic movements
Four patients suffered rostral brainstem strokes, and two had multiple sclerosis
None had been treated with antipsychotic drugs prior to the onset of blepharospasm
Medical treatment was helpful in two patients, and bilateral selective facial nerve section was used in another patient
